items.sentence: I'm assuming the gunshot that I heard was the one that killed Tom.
I told Tom I wanted to go to Australia, but I didn't tell him why.
I told Tom I wouldn't stay in Australia for more than three weeks.
Everyone except Tom knew that he didn't have to stay in Australia.
Do you think that Tom would've enjoyed going to Australia with us?
Do you still think that Tom would like to go to Australia with us?
If the smoke is bothering you, move to the other side of the fire.
Tom believes that the day will come when there'll be no more wars.
I thought that the dress that Mary was wearing looked really nice.
Tokyo's air pollution problem is even worse than that of New York.
